alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 4:22PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Routt and east central Moffat Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Hayden, or 11 miles southeast of Craig, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hayden and Tow Creek. This includes U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 95 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin
